title_teim: The sixteenth annual induction ceremony. 2001. Line Cut Clean Reel 500.
title_ssm: The sixteenth annual induction ceremony. 2001. Line Cut Clean Reel 500.
title_si: The sixteenth annual induction ceremony. 2001. Line Cut Clean Reel 500.
summary_teim: The 2001 Rock Hall induction concludes with performances by Paul Simon, Steely Dan, Mary J. Blige, Bono, Melissa Etheridge and a jam with Johnnie Jones, James Burton, and Solomon Burke.
summary_ssm: The 2001 Rock Hall induction concludes with performances by Paul Simon, Steely Dan, Mary J. Blige, Bono, Melissa Etheridge and a jam with Johnnie Jones, James Burton, and Solomon Burke.
contents_teim: Me and julio down by the schoolyard (Paul Simon with Dion) – Do it again (Steely Dan) – Could you be loved ; Get up stand up (Mary J. Blige, Bono, and Melissa Etheridge) – Jam. Johnnie's boogie (Johnnie Jones, James Burton) ; Everybody needs somebody to love (Solomon Burke, Kid Rock, Keith Richards).
contents_ssm: Me and julio down by the schoolyard (Paul Simon with Dion) – Do it again (Steely Dan) – Could you be loved ; Get up stand up (Mary J. Blige, Bono, and Melissa Etheridge) – Jam. Johnnie's boogie (Johnnie Jones, James Burton) ; Everybody needs somebody to love (Solomon Burke, Kid Rock, Keith Richards).

abstract_ssm: At 2001 Induction Ceremony, performances only -- Me and Julio (Paul Simon with Dion, Marc Anthony, and Jann Wenner) -- Do it Again (Steely Dan with Brian May) -- Could You Be Loved ; Get up Stand Up (Mary J. Blige, Bono, and Melissa Etheridge) – Jam. Johnnie's Boogie (Johnnie Johnson with James Burton, Robbie Robertson, Joe Perry, Tom Hamilton, Brad Whitford, Brian May, and Keith Richards) -- Everybody Needs Somebody to Love (Solomon Burke and Kid Rock join jam session).
